name: Associazione Italiana del Credito al Consumo e Immobiliare
goal: Rappresentanza degli interessi dei principali player italiani dei comparti del credito al consumo e immobiliare
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Fraud prevention
euInitiatives: Directive on consumer credit (CCD), Payment systems (PSD), Anti money laundering (AMLD), Insurance Distribution Directive (IDD), etc...
